components/chiara/responsive-attrs:
{{!--
Params:
- image: Object | null
- default_image: String
- size: String. Example: '160w'
- alt: String
--}}

{{#if image}}
    src="{{getImageSrcset image 1x=(default size '160w')}}"
    srcset="{{getImageSrcset image 1x='80w'}}"
    data-srcset="{{getImageSrcset image use_default_sizes=true}}"
{{else}}
    src="{{default_image}}"
    srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw=="
    data-srcset="{{default_image}}"
{{/if}}
data-sizes="auto"
alt="{{alt}}"
title="{{alt}}"
